title: Teslaâ€™s big, epic, confusing future | The Vergecast
description: Today on the flagship podcast of super helpful humanoid helper robots:   The Verges David Pierce and Andy Hawkins discuss the latest at Tesla: new products, new initiatives, and a payday for Elon Musk.   Vee Song joins the show to discuss updates to the Apple Watch, a new Samsung Galaxy Watch, and more wearable news.   David and Liam James answer a question from the Vergecast Hotline about weather apps.   Links:  Teslas 2024 shareholder meeting: all the news about Elon Musks $50 billion payday:   Lets speculate wildly about Teslas three mystery vehicles:    Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musks massive pay package  was there ever any doubt?:   Whatever Elon wants, Tesla gets:    Finally, the Apple Watch will let you rest:    Samsungs Galaxy Watch FE is its new entry-level smartwatch:    The Pixel Watch 2 can now detect when youve been in a car crash:    Apple announces watchOS 11 with new training features and Live Activities:     Samsung sues Oura preemptively to block smart ring patent claims:     Forecast Advisor:      00:00 - Intro and buying bathroom vanities 04:14 - Tesla chat w/Andy Hawkins 06:23 - Elon Musk's pay package  16:14 - Tesla's new vehicles  36:28 - Wearables w/Vee Song 39:03 - The importance of Rest Days 48:42  - Pixel Watch updates and rumors 53:02 - Samsung's new Galaxy Watch FE 55:55 - The Galaxy Ring vs Oura 59:05 - Weather app w/Liam James  Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:  Follow on TikTok:   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:  More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may receive a commission without exerting any influence on editorial content. For more information about our ethics policy, visit:
